channel.title: Pause and re-play in Synthesized speech? – Politepix

item.title: Pause and re-play in Synthesized speech?
item.dc:creator: karate362
item.description:
Hello, I have tried the TTS engine in openers, it works well. But I am wondering that Is it possible to pause a Synthesized speech and then restart it from the same place? Additionally, after I called [FliteController say:], could I access the progress state when it is speaking?(e.g. what sentence it is speaking)

Many thanks!

item.title: Reply To: Pause and re-play in Synthesized speech?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

Sorry, you can’t pause and restart FliteController speech. The progress state is a new feature of NeatSpeech 1.5 that is about to be released.
